p: In a recent retrospective study by Li et al. including 51 patients with COVID-19 and two other patients with adenovirus, all of them were diagnosed by rRT-PCR, a low rate (3,9%) of COVID-19 misdiagnosis was detected (missed cases). However, some CT features on the initial examination overlapped with CT features of SARS and MERS, including consolidation and septal thickening [ 63]. Another study on 51 patients by Fang et al. revealed 98% sensitivity of CT compared to 71% sensitivity of RT-PCR [ 64].
